citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:49pm on January
6, 2022.
Upon arrival, the licensee was contacted by phone, stating they were out of town.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:49pm on January 
6, 2022. 
 
Upon arrival, the licensee was contacted by phone, stating they were out of town. 
 
 
 
End Section
